message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that has the potential to be incredibly valuable. While I can't disclose all the details, I can assure you it's worth at least $1500000 to me. I'm confident that this product can generate significant returns for the right buyer. I'm willing to sell it to you for $2000000.  Consider this a chance to acquire something truly special. Let me know if you're interested in discussing this further.
